data.title: Hoosiers that were killed or missing in action in Vietnam
data.text:
The following list contains the names of Hoosiers killed or missing in action during the Vietnam War. On the Vietnam Memorial, individuals names are placed on the stone in chronological order - date of death, or date listed as missing in action. This list is organized in alphabetical order, and can be used to determine the place on the Vietnam Memorial where an individual's name can be found - the panel and line number to the right of the name.

To be listed on the Memorial one simply need to have been: 1) A native Hoosier; and, 2) Killed in Action or Missing in Action between 1 January 1959 and 7 May 1975
